citations.narrative:
The facility has not completed any sampling for intestinal parasites within the past year. The Program of Vet Care (PVC)
that the facility has does not specify a schedule for which this sampling is to be done. Sampling and treatment of
parasites, such as worms, coccidia, and giardia, (which are found by fecal testing), as prescribed by the PVC, is a way for
APHIS inspectors to assess that adequate veterinary care is being given to dogs at licensed facilities. Correct by receiving
guidance by the Attending Veterinarian, to implement a schedule for sampling and treatment of parasites. Correct by July
29, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has not completed any sampling for intestinal parasites within the past year. The Program of Vet Care (PVC) 
that the facility has does not specify a schedule for which this sampling is to be done. Sampling and treatment of 
parasites, such as worms, coccidia, and giardia, (which are found by fecal testing), as prescribed by the PVC, is a way for 
APHIS inspectors to assess that adequate veterinary care is being given to dogs at licensed facilities. Correct by receiving 
guidance by the Attending Veterinarian, to implement a schedule for sampling and treatment of parasites. Correct by July 
29, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
